pitapi.pit
Class user

lucee.Component
        pitapi.pit.user

public class user

extends lucee.Component

Handles all requests to /rest/user

Method Summary

          Creates a new user using the given params

          shortcut to creating a datastore through the user endpoint

          Updates a *user* with the given id using the given params
remote any getUser([string user_id], [string project_id])
          Returns the information for the user belonging to the given id

          Get the user with the passed id
private boolean isPasswordValid([string password])
          Check if password meets the complexity requirements
remote any joinProject([string id], [string key])
           Associates the user with the given id to the project with the given key POST /user/{user_id}/project/{project_key}
remote any listDatastores([string id])
          Returns the list of datastores a user owns or belongs to
remote any listProjects([string id])
          Returns the list of projects a user owns or belongs to

          Logs a user into the app

          Reset the user's password
remote any sendResetLink()
          Sends an email to the user's email address with a link to reset their password
 
Methods inherited from class lucee.Component
 

Method Detail

addUser

remote any addUser()
Creates a new user using the given params. Must include the password. Checks to ensure email is unique

createDatastore

remote any createDatastore([string user_id])
shortcut to creating a datastore through the user endpoint. See datastore.addDatastore for more info

Parameters:
user_id

editUser

remote any editUser([string id])
Updates a *user* with the given id using the given params. Requires the current password and will check it is correct prior to making any changes.

Parameters:
id

getUser

remote any getUser([string user_id], [string project_id])
Returns the information for the user belonging to the given id

Parameters:
user_id
project_id

getUserById

package query getUserById([string id])
Get the user with the passed id

Parameters:
id

isPasswordValid

private boolean isPasswordValid([string password])
Check if password meets the complexity requirements. Add more Checks here to require a stronger password

Parameters:
password

joinProject

remote any joinProject([string id], [string key])
Associates the user with the given id to the project with the given key POST /user/{user_id}/project/{project_key}

Parameters:
id
key

listDatastores

remote any listDatastores([string id])
Returns the list of datastores a user owns or belongs to

Parameters:
id

listProjects

remote any listProjects([string id])
Returns the list of projects a user owns or belongs to

Parameters:
id

login

remote any login([string email], [string password])
Logs a user into the app. Returns a token the app can use to authenticate with the server. NOTE: For the function handling logging into the control panel, see auth.login

Parameters:
email
password

logout

remote any logout([numeric id], [string token])
Logs a user out of the app. Invalidates the passed token. NOTE: for logic used to a log a user out of the control panel, see auth.logout

Parameters:
id
token

resetPassword

remote any resetPassword([numeric user_id], [string token])
Reset the user's password. Checks that the token is valid, and that the password is valid, and then updates the database to the new password

Parameters:
user_id
token

sendResetLink

remote any sendResetLink()
Sends an email to the user's email address with a link to reset their password. If no account exists for the given email address, an error will be returned and no email will be sent
